name: Leviamon
description: Leviamon is a giant aquatic Digimon covered in entirely red scales, it's underbody has golden scales with its eyes being sharp and red. Its body seems to also be in the shape of an alligator, with other parts of it being based on the Leviathan, it has two long tails that drag behind it, with blue fins (fading into purple on the top) visible on the top of both tails, and an arrow-shaped fin at the end of both tails.
